---
name: General Issue
about: Create an issue that does not fit other categories
title: "[Issue] - "
labels: triage
assignees: ""
---

## Description
Provide a clear and concise description of the issue.

## Context
Explain why this is relevant or what problem it addresses.

## Proposed solution (if any)
Describe any idea or approach you have in mind.

## Checklist
- [ ] This issue does not duplicate an existing one
- [ ] I provided enough detail for the team to understand and act on it
